# File test/test_array.rb, line 637
  def test_each_index
    a = @cls[*%w( ant bat cat dog )]
    i = 0
    a.each_index { |ind|
      assert_equal(i, ind)
      i += 1
    }
    assert_equal(4, i)

    a = @cls[]
    i = 0
    a.each_index { |ind|
      assert_equal(i, ind)
      i += 1
    }
    assert_equal(0, i)

    assert_equal(a, a.each_index {})
  end
